powerhouse.translation[0].definitions[0]: an organization or place where there is a lot of activity or where a lot of things are produced
powerhouse.translation[0].definitions[1]: someone who is very strong or has a lot of energy
powerhouse.translation[1].definitions[0]: an organization that produces a lot of ideas or activity, and has a lot of power or influence in its field
He wanted to turn the securities firm into a Wall Street powerhouse.
